# Saru

> Tab, Tab, Apply Brilliance – an open-source AI writing tool that seamlessly integrates real-time inline suggestions, style consistency, and document management into a distraction-free writing workflow.

Saru transforms the writing process by placing AI-powered recommendations directly in your text as you type. It refines clarity, grammar, and style without interrupting creative flow. Writers can organize projects, track revisions, and publish content—all within a single interface.

## Core Features
- [Inline Suggestions](https://www.trysaru.com): Contextual recommendations that appear as you write
- [Style Consistency](https://www.trysaru.com): Maintain your unique voice with AI-driven edits
- [Document Management](https://www.trysaru.com/documents): Create, organize, and track revisions in one place
- [Publishing Tools](https://www.trysaru.com): Publish articles or share links directly from the platform
